Text.Page:
It's Prophesied. The goddess bestows her blessing only on brave, with a lion's heart.

...

When the time comes, the God of Terror will fall
The God of Death will kneel

...

The unquenchable flame will vanish
The daughter of chaos will shut her eyes.

...
Read more

The Goddess of Destiny will show the way
A ship, wandering through the skies, will take you beyond the dark walls

...

The lands of the descendants of Orin will meet you

...

The guardian keys of the Lord of Chaos lie deep within the vastness of the primordial dream.

...
Close the book
